email.hint: Your tickets will e-mailed to you.

label.1: I have read, and accept the

errors.terms: You must accept the terms and conditions!

completed.title: Ticket purchase completed
completed.text_1: Your purchase for {number} tickets to {name} has been completed.
completed.text_2: The tickets will be sent to "{email}".

failed.title: Ticket purchase failed
failed.text_1: Something went wrong with your ticket purchase.
failed.text_2: The purchase has been cancelled. You will not be billed.
failed.text_3: If you wish to purchase tickets to a party, please try again.
